name: Woods (mojius)
description:
Woods is a dark, horror text adventure where you play as a girl lost in the woods. As the game states, mind the content warnings for gender identity, violence, body horror, and mental health crises.

Play it through once. Or play it multiple times and visit areas over and over again until you see fragments of the truth. Wander like she does, visiting the same places over and over again.

Made for Foundations of Game Design at UCSC
